column5: Made it out on the ice one last time for some splake. I think it has been almost three times i've said that...lol  There was still lots of ice and plenty of snow in the bush. We could'nt have had better weather. I was even in a t-shirt for a while. Though I'd share a few pics. Check out this splakes stomach contents.
Nice! As long as there's no fishing downtime, you're ok to call it a quits for ice  Otherwise, get back out there this weekend! Lol.
nice going   and here I haven't gone fishing in 3 weeks...slap my hand..I had better find some open water
Were you out Sunday?  We may have been on the same lake.  Got quite the sunburn haha.  Nice splake. I'll be back at 'er friday
two weeks left here I'm pretty sure....I really hope!?
Yeah I was out on Sunday. Back in Boulter. Yourself?
